things.description: A beautiful and tranquil sleepy town on the edge of Maine, at the foot of the the great Cadillac Mountain in Acadia National Park.
A beautiful and tranquil sleepy town on the edge of Maine, at the foot of the the great Cadillac Mountain in Acadia National Park.
My hometown, filled with great people, parks, and great food.
A historic small town with a gorgeous racetrack and wonderful spots.
A great city of Europe with fantastic food, a great beach, and lots of great architecture.
